text: South Carolina's 3rd congressional district is a congressional district in western South Carolina bordering both Georgia and North Carolina. It includes all of Abbeville, Anderson, Edgefield, Greenwood, Laurens, McCormick, Oconee, Pickens, and Saluda counties and parts of Greenville and Newberry counties. ==References== Category:Congressional districts of South Carolina
title: South Carolina's 3rd congressional district
